feed.title: go-proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.7.1
entry.content:
What's changed

New

  • GOPROXY_API_JWT_TOKEN_TTL: control JWT token time-to-live

Changed

  • Moved environment variables from docker compose to .env.example
  • Updated compose.example.yml

Fixed

  • Incorrect behaviors for ls-* commands
  • several typos

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.7.0...0.7.1

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.7.2
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Performance improvement for HTTP routes:
  • ~ 3% when match_domains is not used
  • ~ 60% when match_domains is used
  • Fixed API JSON string response quote not escaping

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.7.3
entry.content: Fixed /stats/ws websocket endpoint error when no match_domains configured 3bf520541b859a740acc98fe909de7e89c58ed4c

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.7.4
entry.content:
What's changed

New: - New rate limiter middleware

Changed: - API server is now protected with rate limiter

Fixed: - Extra dot in app URLs on WebUI dashboard (introduced in v0.7.3)

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.7.5
entry.content:
What's changed

New

  • Default app categories detected from alias and docker image name d89d97b61f2ede5ede7b52d9b52cab40a9463569
  • Option in config.yml to disable it cf1ecbc8268b9b7d2036f4bdbe449f82da0d41c8

Changed

  • Default config added inside docker image c6a9a816f6aa05c8d7fbaa5751f26e6d78fb8073
  • Rebrand as GoDoxy: changed env prefix from GOPROXY to GODOXY (old prefix will still work) 99e43fe3401e62cc462ce55506a9675cc8f8575f f5cf716a912da85eca769251169ed17400f5bc90
  • WebUI / API Authentication will be disabled by default if JWT secret is not set or empty b63ebfcb3b8a55c2a88d11a314989e4a1cc9fe83

Fixed

  • Output of ls-* commands c6a9a816f6aa05c8d7fbaa5751f26e6d78fb8073 5ff27b9e3d1c9e7cdec26150df5de94fee0dbf59
